definition: teacher/husband/doctor (dialect)/CL:位[wei4]
Mister (Mr.)
early/prior/former/in advance/first
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
Mr Goody-goody/yes-man (sb who agrees with anything)
"Mr Democracy", phrase used during the May 4th Movement 五四運動|五四运动[Wu3 si4 Yun4 dong4]/abbr. for 德謨克拉西|德谟克拉西[de2 mo2 ke4 la1 xi1]/see also 賽先生|赛先生[Sai4 xian1 sheng5]
Mr. Bean (TV)
fortune-teller
annoying muddle-headed person who gabbles unintelligibly
bookkeeper (old)
"Mr Science", phrase used during the May 4th Movement 五四運動|五四运动[Wu3 si4 Yun4 dong4]/abbr. for 賽因斯|赛因斯[sai4 yin1 si1]/see also 德先生[De2 xian1 sheng5]
feng shui master/geomancer/stock figure in folk tales, as a wise adviser or a charlatan

sentences.english: Miss Athill did not keep the letters she received from Mr Field.
sentences.chinese: 阿西尔女士并没有保留菲尔德先生写给她的信件。

sentences.english: Mr. Black, I have just been married, therefore can I get a raise in my wages?
sentences.chinese: 布莱克先生，我刚刚结婚了，所以我能提薪吗？

sentences.english: Zhu told a group of us.
sentences.chinese: 朱先生对着我们一群人说到。

sentences.english: Mr Charles was elected (the) chairman of the municipal education committee.
sentences.chinese: 查尔斯当选为先生市教育委员会主任委员。

sentences.english: Mr Wei rushed to Taipei during his rest day on a Sunday to see Mr Zhang.
sentences.chinese: 魏姓同学便利用星期日赶到台北和张先生见面。

sentences.english: Mr. Prasart hasn’t neglected the more modern, Western-facing Thailand in his collections.
sentences.chinese: P先生没有忽略更能代表现代西式泰国的藏品。

sentences.english: Mr. Brown owns the amber anhydrates in the city belfry.
sentences.chinese: 布朗先生领有闹市区塔里的棕色毛巾。

sentences.english: Mr Wakshlag describes it as "a hit-saving machine".
sentences.chinese: 瓦克施莱格先生形容它为一部“热播回放机”。

sentences.english: So Governor, thank you for your leadership on this bill.
sentences.chinese: 所以州长先生，感谢你在这项法案上起到的领导作用。

sentences.english: Mr Green has been out of work for several months and is on his uppers.
sentences.chinese: 格林先生失业好几个月了，现在已过得山穷水尽。

sentences.english: The word reflects the sky Mr. quarter admiration and worship of the sky.
sentences.chinese: 青天两字体现了季先生对青天的敬仰和崇拜。
伦敦的台尔森银行么，先生？

sentences.english: Just show me one county where Dr. Sun's principles have been put in practice.
sentences.chinese: 你给我指出哪一个县实施了孙中山先生的三民主义？

sentences.english: Can I see Mr. Matthews, please?
He was sure, he said diplomatically, that the government would do all it could.
sentences.chinese: 梁先生曾婉转表示，他确信政府已经尽力。

sentences.english: Some are like myself, working as a teacher, reading and writing, content with a simple life.
sentences.chinese: 有的和我一样当教书先生，读读写写满足简朴的生活。

definition: (abbr. for 泰山北斗[Tai4 Shan1 Bei3 dou3]) distinguished figure/doyen/revered authority
great master/master
to die/to depart this life (euphemism)/same as 去世
professor/to instruct/to lecture on/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
to die/to depart this mortal coil
great master (of literature, music etc)
Ji Xianlin (1911-2009), Chinese linguist and Indologist
(greatly respected) teacher
to pass away/to die
"Mr Democracy", phrase used during the May 4th Movement 五四運動|五四运动[Wu3 si4 Yun4 dong4]/abbr. for 德謨克拉西|德谟克拉西[de2 mo2 ke4 la1 xi1]/see also 賽先生|赛先生[Sai4 xian1 sheng5]
preface/introductory remarks/preamble/prelude
Zhuangzi and Laozi, the Daoist masters
to live to the (ripe) age of
inscription/autograph
scholar
Bai Xianyong (1937-), Chinese-Taiwanese-US novelist of Hui descent
